features.featureTitle: Replace the current logo in the home page hero section with the uploaded circular emblem image (IMG-20260121-WA0003-1.jpg) — the version without the white background — featuring 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति' text in Devanagari script around the top, two deity portraits, crossed swords, and a central sunrise symbol over water waves with gradient orange-yellow background. Save the image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-emblem.png and render it in the hero section.
